text: The flag of Harare It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Desing== The Flag of Harare, contains the Zimbabwe Bird, the country's national symbol. ==Related pages== * Harare ==References== Harare Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Harare
